prompt.job.name: Enter job name:
prompt.job.delete.message:
Are you sure you want to delete “%{jobname}”? 
The data will be lost forever. You can also archive the job so it won’t appear in the list but will still be accessible in the journal.
prompt.job.delete.title: Really delete job?
prompt.entry.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the entry with %{duration} for the job %{jobname}?
prompt.entry.delete.title: Really delete entry?
prompt.entry.edit.message: Please adjust the data as needed (Start time | Duration), but make sure to keep the format the same!
prompt.entry.edit.title: Edit entry?
prompt.entry.edit.formaterror.message: The data from the dialog could not be processed. The format may have been changed.
prompt.entry.edit.formaterror.title: Invalid input
prompt.savefile.edit.message:
Editing the source file directly can make it invalid! Only use this function if you know exactly what you're doing—and be careful. 
Do you really want to open the file?
prompt.savefile.edit.title: WARNING!
journal.title: TimeOnTrack Journal
error.getEntryById: Error when accessing active entry. This is the error:
